messages.message: Hi all, I have observed quite a few error reports sent by GCP in emails indicating runtime errors happening on our platform. I looked through them and most of them indicate real issues and bugs, for example `IndexError: list index out of range` in python. I am curious if we are treating these reports seriously and do we have a proper protocol to Jira them and root-cause them and fix them? To me this is quite a crucial matter because whatever problems that happen in our prod, we have full access to logs and pods and we should be able to debug and fix them. The worst thing that can happen to us is that we become numb to these errors and things start acting up in our customer's env. Thoughts?
Totally agree. Related, we also have UI errors that we don't track today. Fixing both backend and UI errors could save us a a lot of anticipated pain.
PS: how do you get these emails? I don't have any. However, the logs do contain these errors that we should triage. We are missing an error tracking software like sentry.io (http://sentry.io) today
Hi @Anil Have you seen emails titled "New error in instabase-main gke_instances" ? I don't recall that I did anything particular to get them. Maybe @Shubham Oli knows?

Iâ€™m also not able to see any emails from GKE.

did you get it just now?
can you forward me any one of them?
yeah for sure. I've been receiving them for quite a while (from the very beginning)
@Anil @Shubham Oli Just forwarded the email to you guys.
you have to enable them in your gcloud notifications, i believe in one of onbaorsing docs i mention how to do this

~It goes to `<mailto:system-alert@instabase.com|system-alert@instabase.com>` and I think most of us are not subscribed to this~

This is different

Found it.

adding anil and myself

added Anil, Kunal, Lydia, Hari, Nidhi, Mohit and myself. Total 19 people now.

We can also add <mailto:eng@instabase.com|eng@instabase.com> (or whatever the engg email group is) instead of the individual accounts.

Also there is a slack integration too in case we want slack alerts instead/alongwith emails.

cc: @Heymian @shaunak for inputs on for email group and slack channel integration
This is great, thanks a ton Shubham!
